messages: 28b758a09ea8d35984b5319eb643b6c5 (16:11): I'm trying to align an img.
ad7e25107704cb85b75f6a1ecaeaede5 (16:16): well I'm 1/3 through the html 4.01 spec, reading it

ad7e25107704cb85b75f6a1ecaeaede5 (16:16): I have to use a combonation of playing a few rounds of freeciv (see www.freeciv.org) then reading for about 10 to 15 minutes then back to freeciv for a few rounds
28b758a09ea8d35984b5319eb643b6c5 (16:17): I've tried abotu4 different ways of centering this image!
28b758a09ea8d35984b5319eb643b6c5 (16:18): This is ridiculous... I can't see what's wrong.
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (16:20): try one of the _two_ ways mentioned at the link I gave you
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (16:20): either text-align: center; on the img's container, or display: block; margin: 0 auto; on the img
62fba5811243f518935848d952809f8c (16:22): And if that doesn't work, then the reason should be obvious: you're doing something to take it out of the document flow partially or fully
ad7e25107704cb85b75f6a1ecaeaede5 (16:25): hey I got my laminated CSS guide in the mail from quickstudy.com
62fba5811243f518935848d952809f8c (16:26): Because whenever I used to see one and go "oh, cool!", it told me absolutely nothing useful
ad7e25107704cb85b75f6a1ecaeaede5 (16:26): reisio ya but they are somewhat good for quick references
62fba5811243f518935848d952809f8c (16:26): And when I finally realized I was making short notes that were more useful and less simplified-to-oblivian, I stopped caring abount it

4f5d64b5e9531fd97985f94cafe5cd15 (16:28): can anyone tell me if there is a way to copy a site including the members area witout ftp access. (my friend wants me to create a mirror of his site) (i do have my own user login to the site)
62fba5811243f518935848d952809f8c (16:29): It supports http auth and whatever else you'll need, probably
62fba5811243f518935848d952809f8c (16:29): or curl or some download managers
4f5d64b5e9531fd97985f94cafe5cd15 (16:29): the login is a form on a page and the members area is dynamicly controled by java script
4f5d64b5e9531fd97985f94cafe5cd15 (16:30): i tryed ht track and a lot of others as well they all do the same and miss out the members area
4f5d64b5e9531fd97985f94cafe5cd15 (16:32): so log in to the site and then snake that url?

ad7e25107704cb85b75f6a1ecaeaede5 (16:33): and its right there on my laminated quick study guide ?
